strapiPost.title: Ozark Society Creates Buffalo River Documentary
strapiPost.content:
The Buffalo River recently had its 50th anniversary of being designated America’s first National River, and the Ozark Society produced a film to commemorate it. 

  • Telling a story: The film is a feature length documentary, and it explores the conservation history of the river as well as the contemporary issues it’s facing. The film is called First River: How Arkansas Saved a National Treasure. 
  • Showing: First River will premiere at the Skylight Cinema in Bentonville on Thursday, March 17. After the premiere, First River will be on the Ozark Society website available to stream for free. 

Read the full Arkansas Money & Politics story HERE.
